ReentrancyType Property

Requires: Base Development System

Class: VI Properties (ActiveX)

Indicates the type of reentrancy LabVIEW uses for a reentrant VI. This property is similar to options on the Execution Properties page of the VI Properties dialog box.

Values

0Share clones between instances—Allocates clones of the reentrant VI on-demand for each call to the reentrant VI. Do not select this option if a clone VI must preserve state information across calls or if the VI is part of an application that needs to minimize jitter.
1Preallocate clone for each instance—Allocates clones of the reentrant VI for each call to the reentrant VI. This option is recommended for VIs that are to run with low jitter on LabVIEW Real-Time.

Syntax

object.ReentrancyType

Data Type

kReentrancyTypeTD
